about.title: About the Studio
about.subtitle: Small teams. Thoughtful games. Long-term craft.
philosophy: We approach development with an indie mindset—scope honestly, respect time, and shape experiences that reward attention.
Learning happens through building. Each prototype refines the feel, the rhythm, and the clarity of play.
Craft over hype. Mood, pacing, and interaction matter. The goal is memorable moments, not noise—small games with meaning.

bio: Solo indie developer focused on small, thoughtful experiences.
Unity and C# roots, patient iteration, and a preference for tangible craft.
Learn by building, finish what you start, and let the work speak calmly.

starfall-echoes.title: Starfall Echoes
starfall-echoes.tagline: A quiet journey through collapsing constellations.
starfall-echoes.description: Traverse fading skies where constellations whisper the last notes of their stories. Starfall Echoes blends meditative exploration with subtle puzzle rhythms—guiding fragments of light to reconcile drifting worlds.

glassbound.title: Glassbound
glassbound.tagline: Fragile worlds, resilient choices, shimmering paths.
glassbound.description: A reflective journey through delicate spaces—where each step leaves a trail and each decision refracts into new possibilities. Minimal mechanics, maximal mood.

tide-of-ciphers.title: Tide of Ciphers
tide-of-ciphers.tagline: Decode the shoreline; the ocean remembers everything.
tide-of-ciphers.description: A slow coast along encrypted horizons. Rewards curiosity and patience, letting meaning surface in fragments before the bigger shape becomes clear.
